entry.title: Stage III evacuations expected to be lifted Friday, September 1st.
entry.summary: Closures & Evacuations: Stage III evacuations remain in effect for Quartz Creek and Cougar Gulch. Evacuation orders in the Cougar Gulch are expected to be lifted at 8:00 am Friday September
entry.content: Closures & Evacuations: Stage III evacuations remain in effect for Quartz Creek and Cougar Gulch. Evacuation orders in the Cougar Gulch are expected to be lifted at 8:00 am Friday September
